description: Primes p such that x^12 = 2 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A049544 relative to A000040.Coincides for the first 119 terms with sequence of primes p such that x^36 = 2 has no solution mod p (first divergence is at 919, cf. A059668).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^12 - 2, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[100]],ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 14 2012 *)
author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jan 23 2001
